title: 有没有RPG插件，能设置物品穿戴时的血量的？
author: 俞俊涛
txt_content:
[diamond_pickaxe]有没有一个插件，使玩家穿戴时，能增加个人血量上限？

[diamond_sword]高悬赏，速速来回复。

replies.txt_content:
lore插件，插件地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=518153&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3Dlore%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D，file:///C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Tencent\Users\171884481\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\6JNL5NU06C%_$5)OZ$1{G)W.pngfile:///C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Tencent\Users\171884481\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\6JNL5NU06C%_$5)OZ$1{G)W.png看配置，里面有个玩家基础生命值。file:///C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Tencent\Users\171884481\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\6JNL5NU06C%_$5)OZ$1{G)W.png
file:///C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Tencent\Users\171884481\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\6JNL5NU06C%_$5)OZ$1{G)W.png

itemlorestats插件就可以了
链接:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-248288-1-1.html
建议配合lore插件使用
当然all u wantmod也是可以达到效果
